dhp384:2: The commentary says this refers to the mastery of two things, serenity and discernment (cf. DN 34:1.3.5). However, the term is not “two” but “duality” (dvaya), suggesting a link to SN 35.92:2.2, the duality of sense experience.
dhp416:1: This verse and the next are identical. The commentary says they were spoken on two separate occasions.
